name: corrosion
effect: This Pokémon's moves and item ignore the usual immunity of Poison and Steel Pokémon when attempting to inflict poison.
short_effect: This Pokémon can inflict poison on Poison and Steel Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a Steel or Poison type.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a Steel or Poison type.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon can poison the target even if it’s a Steel or Poison type.
